Summary: Amber orb hoovering change direction then releases fireball looking from orb falling toward land but fireball extingush before hitting the ground
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Oakley
There were no other sightings in Oakley on or around December 15th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI went out on my front porch to let my cat in. I called for her and happened to look up at the stars. I seen a amber orb and immediatly called my husband that said it was a plane. I said no look at it. We watched it for several minutes and it dropped fireball looking things 4 of them and they extinguish before hitting the ground. it was far away from us.
